about_the_game:
Christmas Story is a horror game that blends the warmth of Christmas evenings with chilling mysteries.

One winter evening, a grandson travels to a quiet, snow-covered village to visit his grandfather. The village house is filled with a cozy Christmas atmosphere: the fire crackles in the stove, garlands twinkle on the tree, and snowflakes swirl outside the window. Everything seems perfect until the grandfather decides to share an old Christmas story...

At first, the tale seems like a simple fairy tale, but as the story unfolds, the line between reality and fiction begins to blur. You find yourself drawn into a terrifying chain of events where Christmas symbols take on sinister forms, and the cozy atmosphere turns into a nightmare.

Will you be able to escape this haunting story, or will you become a part of it?

Key Features:

  • Atmospheric Contrast: Experience a journey from cozy Christmas lights to dark horror.

  • Interactive Story: A narrative that evolves based on your actions and decisions.

  • Puzzles and Secrets: Solve the mysteries of the village and uncover what lies behind the grandfather's story.

  • Detailed World: Explore an atmospheric village with intricate environments, from snowy forests to abandoned houses.

  • Terrifying Moments: Unexpected scenes and eerie creatures inspired by Christmas mythology.

Christmas Story immerses you in an adventure where a Christmas evening could become the beginning of your worst nightmare.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-3470 or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS 10, 11 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
